actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to allow the State of Wisconsin to use the proceeds of veterans' mortgage bonds for the purpose of acquiring  or replacing mortgages of veterans who were unable to obtain veterans' bond financing because of a court challenge to the constitutionality of such State's borrowing power.

summary.text: Allows the State of Wisconsin to use the proceeds of tax-exempt veterans' mortgage bonds for the purpose of acquiring or replacing mortgages of veterans who were unable to obtain veterans' bond financing because of a court challenge to the constitutionality of such State's borrowing power.

titles.title: A bill to allow the State of Wisconsin to use the proceeds of veterans' mortgage bonds for the purpose of acquiring  or replacing mortgages of veterans who were unable to obtain veterans' bond financing because of a court challenge to the constitutionality of such State's borrowing power.
